728673f-a.text:
Center Street, at the N.W. corner of Court Place, showing the old Richmond County Clerk and Surrogate's office. It was later renovated and made the home of the Staten Island Historical Society Museum. The plaque above the center door bears the date 1848.
April 26, 1928
P. L. Sperr
728673f-a.folder: Center Street & Court Place, Staten Island, NY

728675f-a.text:
(1)
Center Street, at the N.W. corner of Court Place (Richmond), showing the Staten Island Historical Society Museum. This building was formerly the County Clerk's and Surrogate's office and was built in 1848. It was restored to its present condition in 1934.

August 8, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, another view.
August 8, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
728675f-a.folder: Center Street & Court Place, Staten Island, NY

728671f-b.text:
Center Street, south side, at the head of Court Place, showing the old Richmond County Court House and
the county jail (right).

About 1910
By Mulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection
(2)

The same, years later.
1923
P. L. Sperr

(3)
Looking up Court Place toward the old County
Court House.
June 16, 1935
P. L. Sperr

728672f-a.text:
(1)
Center Street, at the N.E. corner of Court Place (Richmond). The maps from 1874 to 1907 indicate it to have been the J. S. Black
house.
May 17, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date. Note alterations.
May 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

728672f-b.folder: Center Street & Court Place, Staten Island, NY

728674f-b.text:
(1)
Center Street, at the N.W. corner of Court Place (Richmond), showing the old County Clerk's and Surrogate'e office building which was erected in 1848 and used for that purpose until 1920. It has been restored and made the home of the Staten Island Historical Society Museum. For additional data see 'The Sun", October 10, 1936.
May 17, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date, during restoration work..
October 13, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The museum after completion.
August 8, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
728674f-b.folder: Center Street & Court Place, Staten Island, NY
